ai-patthana15.38:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously:
ai-patthana15.38:0.3_0: doing what is good, urgency and wholesome,
ai-patthana15.38:1.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to a foundation for support. Unware what’s skillful.
ai-patthana15.38:2.1_0: A unskillful quality doesn’t give rise to an individual. Unskillfulness cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.38:3.1_0: Without an undetermined object, without response, cause, with no reason.
